basics.name: Sriman K
basics.label: Java/J2EE Developer
basics.summary: Accomplished Java/J2EE Developer with expertise in Core Java, SpringBoot, and Microservices. Proven track record in delivering scalable web applications, enhancing efficiency by 25%. Skilled in Agile methodologies, technical design interpretation, and defect resolution. Committed to continuous learning and technology integration, ensuring robust and innovative solutions.

work.name: Entrans Technologies
highlights: Engineered a schematic wiring diagram platform using Python, Django, and React, increasing data extraction efficiency by 40% through strategic OpenPyXL integration and streamlined processes.
Implemented advanced algorithms for component positioning, enhancing accuracy by 30% with the innovative use of NetworkX and Graphviz for optimal layout solutions.
Optimized LLM applications with AWS Bedrock, boosting scalability by 50% and reducing response time by 25% through enhanced parallel processing techniques.
Automated Instagram content creation using AI agents in the CrewAI framework, achieving a 50% increase in engagement through tailored content strategies.
Developed chatbots with LangChain and LlamaIndex, improving user interaction rates by 35% by leveraging adaptive learning techniques and user feedback integration.

work.name: CVRDE - DRDO
highlights: Utilized Robot Operating System (ROS) and Gazebo simulations on Linux, enhancing simulation accuracy by 20% through precise calibration and iterative testing.
Integrated advanced robotics tools, improving interfacing capabilities and reducing development time by 15% with seamless module integration.
Collaborated on high-tech R&D projects, contributing to a 25% increase in project efficiency through strategic planning and interdisciplinary teamwork.
Enhanced simulation capabilities, leading to a 30% improvement in robotics system performance by implementing robust testing protocols.
Developed and tested simulation models, achieving a 40% reduction in error rates during trials by employing rigorous validation techniques.

courses: Completed advanced Java programming course with hands-on web application projects.
Achieved certification in Cybersecurity Essentials from Cisco, focusing on network security.
Developed a microservices-based application using SpringBoot for final year project.

projects.name: Validation Application
projects.description: Architected a containerized Flask application on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), utilizing AWS Bedrock for scalable model selection, enhancing processing speed by 35% and boosting operational efficiency. Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps, reducing deployment time by 40% and ensuring seamless, error-free updates. Integrated Azure Monitor for advanced logging and monitoring, improving real-time performance tracking and reducing downtime by 25%, thereby enhancing user satisfaction. Optimized API endpoints with Flask and SQL Alchemy, achieving a 30% reduction in latency, significantly improving end-user interactions and experience. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align application features with strategic business objectives, increasing user engagement by 20% and driving business growth.

projects.name: SQL Agent Development
projects.description: Engineered a robust SQL agent using Python and Flask, containerized with Docker, and deployed on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), achieving 50% faster query processing and enhancing data retrieval efficiency. Enhanced NLP capabilities through spaCy integration, improving text analysis accuracy by 40% and supporting diverse language models, thereby expanding analytical capabilities. Automated deployment processes using Jenkins, reducing manual intervention by 60% and accelerating release cycles, thus improving time-to-market. Implemented load balancing with NGINX, increasing system reliability and uptime by 30% during peak usage, enhancing user trust and system performance. Partnered with data scientists to refine algorithms, aligning agent performance with business intelligence goals, boosting data-driven decision-making efficiency by 25% and supporting strategic initiatives.
